story_18_51000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Looks like the tournament matches are
ramping up!
story_18_51000/2401_1001_0200_10:
That being said, I’m still amazed that you’ve
gotten this strong, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_18_51000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Hehe! You’re right, Brock!
It’s pretty amazing how fast [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he’s" F="she’s" ] been growing.
story_18_51000/2401_1001_0400_10:
If we can keep this up, I think our team
might really be able to do it!
story_18_51000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Bwahaha!
Careful, someone might overhear that utter
nonsense you’re spouting over there!
story_18_51000/2401_1001_0800_10:
You should save that sort of talk for bedtime—
the only tournament you stand a chance at
winning is the one in your dreams!
story_18_51000/2401_1001_1000_10:
I AM impressed, however, that you somehow
managed to get even this far.
story_18_51000/2401_1001_1100_10:
You must have some seriously good luck... I’m
curious to see how far it will actually take you.
story_18_51000/2401_0301_1300_10:
It’s our teamwork that’s 
gotten us this far!
story_18_51000/2401_0401_1400_10:
Teamwork? Hah! Pure nonsense... 
Relying on others does NOT count as winning!
story_18_51000/2401_0302_1500_10:
We’re gonna win this 
together as a team!
story_18_51000/2401_0402_1600_10:
As a team? Hah! Pure nonsense... 
Relying on others does NOT count as winning!
story_18_51000/2401_1001_1800_10:
You heard [Name:PlayerNickname ]! We’re a
team! We all worked together to make it this far!
story_18_51000/2401_1001_1900_10:
Yeah! And all of our opponents up until now
have had amazing teams, too!
story_18_51000/2401_1001_2000_10:
If you keep up that attitude, you’ll never know
what true teamwork feels like, and I bet you’ll
never be able to win... I feel sorry for you.
story_18_51000/2401_1001_2100_10:
Excuse me?!
Did you just say YOU feel sorry for ME?
story_18_51000/2401_1001_2200_10:
How dare you speak to the young master
that way!
story_18_51000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Ugh, why don’t you just disqualify them?
I’m sure you could, as the founder and all...
story_18_51000/2401_1001_2500_10: Y-young Master? Are you all right?
story_18_51000/2401_1001_2600_10:
Ridiculous! Pure nonsense!
Bonds, teamwork, sync pairs—all of it!
story_18_51000/2401_1001_2700_10:
You’d have to be a complete fool to believe
any of that nonsense will make you stronger!
Surely, you must be joking!
story_18_51000/2401_1001_2800_10:
The ONLY way to attain true strength is to train
yourself hard—without relying on anyone else!
You and you alone!
story_18_51000/2401_1001_2900_10:
You have seen how powerful I am firsthand—
isn’t that proof enough? Is your weakness not
proof enough?!
story_18_51000/2401_1001_3000_10:
Say whatever you like—you shall never be strong
enough to overcome the massive difference
in power between us!
story_18_51000/2401_1001_3200_10:
I challenge you to a battle! If you refuse, 
I shall revoke your right to compete!
Lose the battle, and you’ll be just as gone!
story_18_51000/2401_1001_3300_10:
Watch! I shall beat you to a pulp,
just like last time, and you will be out
of this competition for good.
story_18_51000/2401_1001_3400_10:
And let it be a lesson to you! 
Bonds and teamwork are nothing 
but a ridiculous load of garbage!
